function.description: A reusable block of code that performs a specific task

examples.title: Basic Function
examples.explanation: This function takes a name parameter and returns a greeting message

variable.description: A container that stores data values

examples.title: Variable Declaration
examples.explanation: Different ways to declare variables in JavaScript

array.description: A data structure that stores multiple values in a single variable

examples.title: Array Operations
examples.explanation: Creating an array, adding elements, and accessing elements by index

loop.description: A programming construct that repeats a block of code
loop.syntax: for (let i = 0; i < length; i++) { /* code */ }

examples.title: For Loop
examples.explanation: A for loop that prints numbers from 0 to 4

object.description: A collection of key-value pairs that represents an entity
object.syntax: let objectName = { key1: value1, key2: value2 };

examples.title: Object Creation
examples.explanation: Creating an object with properties and accessing them
